structure.unit: SANITARIANS, WATER PLANT OPERATORS, AND WATER WELL CONSTRUCTION PRACTICES

law.catch_line: Compliance with KRS 223.405 to 223.460 necessary to work in Kentucky.
law.text: All water well drillers, before doing any water well related work in Kentucky, must comply with KRS 223.405 to 223.460 notwithstanding comparable state provisions in states other than Kentucky.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 215, sec. 11, effective July 13, 1984.
